details.description:
Bangladesh University of Business & Technology(BUBT)Office of the MBA Director
 
NOTICE
It is hereby notified all the students of MBA program that who are failed to register their courses for Spring-2021, to communicate with  Mr. Didar Hossain via telephone  (Cell No: 01813153203 )   or physically at University ( Building- 4, Room No. 602). Mr. Didar is available in the office from Sunday to Thursday at 11.00 am to 4.00 pm. Students are requested to complete their registration before mid- term exam (04-06-2021). It is urgent. 
 
Prof. Dr. Md. Ali NoorDirectorMBA ProgramBUBT
